verbose_text: This work opens an avenue to the application of metal ion-nucleic acid interactions in rapid detection of single nucleotide alteration in gene sequences, such as pathological point mutations, single nucleotide polymorphism (SNPs), and DNA methylation in variety of disease states including cancer.
evidence: acid interactions in rapid detection of single nucleotide alteration in gene sequences, such as pathological point mutations, single nucleotide polymorphism (SNPs), and DNA methylation
